question: Please tell me about the dream I saw
answer:
QUESTION
I saw I am going on the bicycle passing through a place where there are lot of goat standing one sits on the handle of my bike I tried to get him off I was unable to then I asked him where you want to go the goat replied to Jannat. Please tell me what does this mean. Jazakumallahokhair
ANSWER


Share:
The dream is a reminder of our ultimate journey and goal - Jannah. For that,
one must be steadfast on Imaan and good deeds.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
